comments.content:
Hi Guan. Can you try setting adding this to your nova.conf file:

--lock_path=/tmp

You can use any directory the nova user can write to.

The latest code requires a writable lock file directory.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dan-prince

comments.content: I would also add that it would be nice to have lock_path default to something reasonable (writable) when using the nova packages.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dan-prince

comments.content: Thank you, Dan Prince. I confirmed in my environment. It works. Thank you very much.
